attributes.action: Give Maggie Jones a posthumous MBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To recognise the acting ability of Maggie Jones, most notable for her role in Coronation St depicting the cantankerous role of Blanche Hunt, by awarding her a posthumous MBE - with particular recognition to her comedic talents, which were superior to that of the majority of her contemporaries.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
